document.full_text: 'balm in gilead,' in a brooklyn warehouse, was the sort of theatrical hot mess, done with the blessing of lanford wilson's estate, that rarely happens on such a scale in new york nowadays.
document.title: a theater is conjured, then leaves only memory
lines_and_colors: 'balm in gilead,' in a brooklyn warehouse, was the sort of theatrical hot mess, done with the blessing of lanford wilson's estate, that rarely happens on such a scale in new york nowadays.
